properties.name: spring.logging.level.root
properties.description: Configure the root logging level (e.g., INFO, DEBUG, WARN, ERROR).

properties.name: spring.logging.level.org.springframework.r2dbc
properties.description: Configure the logging level for R2DBC operations.

properties.name: spring.logging.level.com.blacklisthub
properties.description: Configure the logging level for the com.blacklisthub package.

properties.name: spring.management.endpoints.web.exposure.include
properties.description: A comma-separated list of endpoint IDs that should be exposed over web endpoints (e.g., health, info, metrics).

properties.name: spring.management.endpoint.health.show-details
properties.description: When to show full health details (never, when-authorized, always).

properties.name: spring.management.endpoint.health.probes.enabled
properties.description: Enable Kubernetes liveness and readiness probes.

properties.name: slack.app-token
properties.description: The Slack App-Level Token (xapp-) used for Socket Mode connections.

properties.name: slack.bot-token
properties.description: The Slack Bot User OAuth Token (xoxb-) used for authenticating API requests.

properties.name: slack.signing-secret
properties.description: The Slack Signing Secret used for verifying incoming requests from Slack.

properties.name: app.allowed-channels
properties.description: A comma-separated list of Slack channel IDs where the bot is allowed to operate.
